meanings.definition: A person who entertains or amuses others.
meanings.sent1: The regalers at the party had everyone laughing with their jokes.
meanings.sent2: The regalers at the circus performed amazing tricks to entertain the audience.
meanings.sent3: The regalers at the comedy show made the audience burst into laughter.
meanings.sent4: The regalers at the event were like shining stars, spreading joy to everyone.
meanings.sent5: The regalers in the play brought the characters to life with their lively performances.

meanings.sent1: The clown regalers the children with his funny antics.
meanings.sent2: The magician regalers the crowd with his mind-blowing tricks.
meanings.sent3: The comedian regalers the audience with his witty jokes.
meanings.sent4: The musician regalers the listeners with a beautiful melody.
meanings.sent5: The storyteller regalers the group with captivating tales of adventure.
